thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Fiona

author: Fiona
title: Fiona
text:
Mabel's labels have saved us a lot of heart aches and head aches!
We have attached them to much loved stuffy labels, school clothing, lunch boxes, tools, suitcases, cell phones, water bottles, and pretty much anything that we don't want to loose!
On the label is our surname and cell number, we have had calls/text messages from restaurants and cafes, rec centres and shopping malls, friends houses and parties regarding various items we had left behind or lost - these would never have been returned to us had we not used Mabels Labels!
We have clothes, lunch boxes and tupperware boxes that still have the labels attached almost 4 years after applying them, testifying to the fact that these labels don't wash off in the dish washer or fall off in the tumble drier for a VERY long time!
I thoroughly recommend Mabel's Labels and hope your experience with them matches mine!
